mapper.insert: insert into t_postpone_history (id, order_id, customer_id, pay_type, postpone_count, pay_order_id, repay_amount, repayment_time, channel_repay_mumber, channel, client_id, client_version, bank_no, bank_mobile, customer_name, idCard, deal_code, postpone_days, is_entry_done, payoff_time, total_relief_amount, product_type, created_time, updated_time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postponeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repayAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{repaymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{channelRepayMumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postponeDays,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isEntryDone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payoffTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{totalReliefAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update t_postpone_history set order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postpone_count = #{postponeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_order_id = #{payOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, repay_amount = #{repayAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, repayment_time = #{repaymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, channel_repay_mumber = #{channelRepayMumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, channel = #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_id = #{clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_version = #{clientVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_no = #{bankNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_mobile = #{bankMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_name = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idCard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deal_code = #{dealCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postpone_days = #{postponeDays,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_entry_done = #{isEntryDone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payoff_time = #{payoffTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, total_relief_amount = #{totalReliefAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, product_type = #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, order_id, customer_id, pay_type, postpone_count, pay_order_id, repay_amount, repayment_time, channel_repay_mumber, channel, client_id, client_version, bank_no, bank_mobile, customer_name, idCard, deal_code, postpone_days, is_entry_done, payoff_time, total_relief_amount, product_type, created_time, updated_time from t_postpone_history where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select id, order_id, customer_id, pay_type, postpone_count, pay_order_id, repay_amount, repayment_time, channel_repay_mumber, channel, client_id, client_version, bank_no, bank_mobile, customer_name, idCard, deal_code, postpone_days, is_entry_done, payoff_time, total_relief_amount, product_type, created_time, updated_time from t_postpone_history

select id, order_id, customer_id, pay_type, postpone_count, pay_order_id, repay_amount, repayment_time, channel_repay_mumber, channel, client_id, client_version, bank_no, bank_mobile, customer_name, idCard, deal_code, postpone_days, is_entry_done, payoff_time, total_relief_amount, product_type, created_time, updated_time from t_postpone_history WHERE order_id = #{orderId} ORDER BY created_time DESC;
